title: Quick Question
body:
So this is just a normal question, but when was Yorick last on Free Rotation? 'Cause I haven't seen him on for like a year.

{{champion:83}}

replies.body:
Yorick hasn't been on the rotation for about 2 years because Riot admit he's crap and don't want to waste peoples time on him.

He will be put back on the rotation after his rework later this year

Every week we choose 10 different Champions that can be played for free.  We choose a variety of Champions from different roles, to help players test out Champions they might be on the fence about, or simply to help pad out a new player's roster.  If you would like to know more about how we choose the Champions for Free Rotation, you can read about it here:

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=46045

Yorick probably hasn't been on in awhile because he is up for a rework soon!

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule
